abstract: Internal letters cast a new spotlight on senior executives of the Swiss bank UBS, and some of the letters show that the bank ignored warnings about possible violations of securities laws.
snippet: Internal letters cast a new spotlight on senior executives of the Swiss bank UBS, and some of the letters show that the bank ignored warnings about possible violations of securities laws.
lead_paragraph: Senior executives at the Swiss bank UBS were alerted at least three years ago to possible violations of United States securities laws in dealings with American clients of its private bank, according to internal letters.

headline.main: As Early as 2005, UBS Executives Were Told of Possible Offshore Violations
headline.print_headline: As Early as 2005, UBS Executives Were Told of Possible Offshore Violations
